member.name: WINTRUST_SIGNATURE_SETTINGS
member.summary: The WINTRUST_SIGNATURE_SETTINGS structure can be used to specify the signatures on a file.

member.name: WINTRUST_SIGNATURE_SETTINGS.cbStruct
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: WINTRUST_SIGNATURE_SETTINGS.dwIndex
member.summary: Contains the index of the signature to be validated if the dwFlags member is set to WSS_VERIFY_SPECIFIC.

summary.para: Flags that can be used to refine behavior. This can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: Set this value if you set the dwIndex parameter.
Set this value to return the number of secondary signatures found in the cSecondarySigs member.

member.name: WINTRUST_SIGNATURE_SETTINGS.cSecondarySigs
member.summary: Contains the number of secondary signatures found if the dwFlags member is set to WSS_GET_SECONDARY_SIG_COUNT.

member.name: WINTRUST_SIGNATURE_SETTINGS.dwVerifiedSigIndex
member.summary: The index used for verification. This member is set on return from Wintrust.

member.name: WINTRUST_SIGNATURE_SETTINGS.pCryptoPolicy
member.summary: Pointer to a structure that contains the policy that a signature must pass to be considered valid.
